## Key Additions by Part

### Part 8: Detection & Mitigation (Blue Team Perspective)
**New Sections Added:** 10 phases  
**Key Topics:**
- Detection Rules & Alert Tuning
- EDR/XDR/MDR Capabilities
- SOC & SIEM Fundamentals
- Threat Hunting Methodology
- Incident Response Lifecycle
- Forensic Fundamentals
- Blue Team Evasion Counter-Measures

### Part 16: Wireless Pentesting (MAJOR EXPANSION)
**New Sections Added:** 6 advanced stages  
**Coverage:**
- ‚úÖ **Bluetooth & BLE Attacks** (Bluesnarfing, KNOB, Pairing Bypass)
- ‚úÖ **Zigbee & Z-Wave** (IoT Protocol Attacks)
- ‚úÖ **NFC & RFID** (Card Cloning, Relay Attacks, Smartcard Exploitation)
- ‚úÖ **GPS & Satellite Spoofing** (GNSS, Drone Hijacking)
- ‚úÖ **SDR & Spectrum Analysis** (Signal Demodulation, Protocol Fuzzing)
- ‚úÖ **KRACK & PMKID Attacks** (Advanced WPA2/WPA3 Exploitation)

### Part 27: AI & LLM Red Teaming (MAJOR EXPANSION)
**New Sections Added:** 7 advanced stages  
**Deep Coverage:**
- ‚úÖ **Adversarial Examples** (Perturbations, UAP, Bypass Filters)
- ‚úÖ **Model Extraction & Inversion** (API Probing, Training Data Extraction)
- ‚úÖ **Dataset Poisoning & Backdoors** (Label Flipping, Trojan Attacks)
- ‚úÖ **Privacy Attacks** (Membership Inference, De-anonymization)
- ‚úÖ **Multi-Model & Agent Attacks** (Agent Jailbreaking, Tool Abuse)
- ‚úÖ **Defense & Responsible AI** (Hardening, Monitoring, Threat Modeling)

### Part 3: Footprinting and Reconnaissance
**New Sections:** IPv6, Dark Web, Satellite Intelligence  
**Added:** 16 items covering advanced OSINT techniques

### Part 4: Scanning
**New Sections:** Stealth/Evasion, Advanced Techniques  
**Added:** 43 items including fragmentation, decoys, idle scanning, WAF bypass

### Part 5: Enumeration
